summary: Personal project I did because I wanted to try to recreate her. She's turned out great, so I figured that I should share her with you. Meet Medusa from the Astoria visual novel from the Lovestruck application.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Medusa - A Racemenu Preset[/size][/color]
[/b]
[size=4]Description:[/size]

Meet Medusa, a preset I made for Racemenu. She's inspired by the character from the Astoria visual novel from the Lovestruck application found on IOS and Android. Medusa is my favorite character, so I decided to try recreating her using Skyrim. She turned out great, so I decided to share her with you guys. If you like her, please endorse.

[center]﻿[img]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/401194105868255235/462333526751051778/Comparison_Shot.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]
[center]Thanks Ileji for creating this comparison photo![/center]
Requirements:

[list]
[*]Skyrim
[*]SKSE
[*]Racemenu
[/list]
Mods Needed to recreate her:
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url]﻿ - For her hair.
[*][url=http://]Skyrim's Ultimate Eye Mesh Ruhmastered[/url]﻿ - For the eye mesh.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91662]Van Gogh's Eyes[/url]﻿/[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/]Natural Eyes[/url]﻿ - I installed Van Gogh's eyes as the main eye texture, and replaced it's grey eyes with the Natural Eye's grey eye texture.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]﻿ - For her skin and makeup
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url]﻿ - For her face
[/list]
author: Spasticon1
